rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: Spacious hall with North-facing entrance aligning with Vastu principles. Features a welcoming pathway leading to central courtyard.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Open-plan living area adjacent to the courtyard. Floor-to-ceiling windows on one side for natural light and views of the garden.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern kitchen with efficient layout adjacent to dining area, integrating with the living room.

rooms.name: Studio Apartment
rooms.description: Spacious studio apartment on split-level design that offers a sense of separation while maintaining open connectivity with the main living area.

rooms.name: Private Courtyard
rooms.description: Central courtyard accessible from the entrance hall and living room for a natural light well. It features garden space, water element, seating areas, and aligns with Vastu principles by having water elements to the North.

openings.name: Main Entrance
openings.description: North-facing entrance designed for optimal energy flow per Vastu. Features a wide doorway and steps leading into the main hall.

openings.name: Windows
openings.description: Floor-to-ceiling windows in living room, kitchen, and studio apartment to allow abundant natural light and views of the garden and courtyard.

openings.name: Courtyard Access
openings.description: Multiple openings around the central courtyard connecting the entrance hall, living room, and studio areas. Designed for ventilation and a seamless transition between indoor and outdoor spaces.
